seo.title: Veo 3.1 Fast ‚Äì High-Speed AI Video Generation (with or without Audio)
seo.description: Use Veo 3.1 Fast for affordable, rapid AI video generation. Up to 8-second clips with optional native audio‚Äîperfect for social formats and fast iteration via MaxVideoAI.

hero.title: Veo 3.1 Fast ‚Äì Faster AI Video with Optional Audio
hero.intro: Veo 3.1 Fast brings DeepMind‚Äôs cinematic controls to a lower price point. You keep the prompt fidelity and camera presets from Veo 3.1, choose up to 8-second clips, and toggle native audio on or off for agile testing.

overview: Balance quality and speed with Veo 3.1 Fast. It keeps DeepMind‚Äôs framing controls while cutting latency and cost, and optional native audio lets you add ambience without waiting for full Veo 3.1 runs.

bestUseCases.title: Best use cases
items: Create short AI clips (up to 8 seconds) with optional native audio
Generate fast loops for social content in 9:16 or 16:9
Test narrative prompts quickly before longer or pricier runs
Balance quality and speed for rapid creative iteration

promptStructure.title: Prompt structure
promptStructure.quote: ‚ÄúA misty forest at dawn, camera slowly zooms in on a mossy rock, sun rays piercing the trees, ambient birdsong, no dialogue.‚Äù
steps: Describe light, texture, and focal subjects clearly
Call out camera moves and time of day to set the mood
Add ambient sound cues when audio is enabled
Stay under ~25 words to keep runs fast and efficient
Stick to single-scene prompts‚ÄîFast mode excels at focused shots

prompts.title: Misty forest zoom
prompts.prompt: Misty forest at dawn, camera slowly zooms toward a mossy rock while sun rays cut through trees, ambient birdsong and no dialogue.
prompts.notes: Enable audio for subtle ambience or switch it off for silent loops.

faqs.q: Where does Veo 3.1 Fast sit in the lineup?
faqs.a: It bridges Veo 3 Fast and Veo 3.1. You keep framing controls and Dolby previews from 3.1 with shorter turnaround‚Äîgreat for reviews that still need quality.
Yes. Clone any Veo 3.1 render and switch the engine to 3.1 Fast. Camera and tone presets transfer so stakeholders can compare outputs easily.
Expect roughly 15% savings versus full Veo 3.1 runs while keeping premium framing. The calculator and queue display the exact rate before each render.

pricingNotes: Live pricing updates inside the Generate workspace. Check the current rate before you run a job.
